name: Bullet Light (GuilhermeH)
description:
This game is free and its not 100% ready, if you can rate my game it would be a great help, any criticism will be good.

The goal is publish in Google Play, so if you can help me I'm greatful.

Devices

By now the game have only android support

  • Android using arm 7a
  • Android using arm64 8a
  • Android both that support the previous 2 in the same apk
